code: import{Map}from"immutable";import*as actionTypes from"./constants";var defaultState=Map({category:[],currentCategory:"",songList:[]});function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:defaultState;var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;switch(action.type){case actionTypes.CHANGE_CATEGORY:return state.set("category",action.category);case actionTypes.CHANGE_CURRENT_CATEGORY:return state.set("currentCategory",action.currentCategory);case actionTypes.CHANGE_SONG_LIST:return state.set("songList",action.songList);default:return state;}}export default reducer;
